name: perf_infra.elite_org_metric_big_org_rps_last_50
description: Performance scores of every route load and user interaction (metric) for Big Orgs with max(7 days, last_50_data_points) datapoints

schema.name: type
schema.description: The metric type, either user_interaction or route_load.

schema.name: score
schema.description: The metric's score, computed from its p95 over the past week.

schema.name: score_times_count_prod
schema.description: The metric's score, multiplied by its count_prod. This is a helpful column to precompute because custom aggregation functions are disallowed.

schema.name: score_times_count
schema.description: The metric's score, multiplied by its count. This is a helpful column to precompute because custom aggregation functions are disallowed.

schema.name: count
schema.description: The number of data points we have for this metric.

schema.name: count_prod
schema.description: The number of data points we have for this metric from production traffic

schema.name: rolling_p95
schema.description: The week-rolling p95 value for this metric.

schema.name: most_recent_date
schema.description: The most recent date for which we have data for this metric.
